attributes.action: Bring the British Troops/Soldiers back to their Homes In Britian
attributes.additional_details:
Thousands of British People who have gone to War Representing Britian Overseas are Getting needesly Killed.
People's Lives are Being ruined and People are Losing their Friends and Family members.
Over 400 British People have Died in Afghanistan since the War over there began.
In some Places British troops are Fighting in a War that has nothing to do with us but still the Government makes people Die. The Wars are not our cause and shouldn't be our concern. Most of us can't see why were Fighting for other Countries overseas anyway.
The People were Fighting for Overseas don't appreciate it or even want us there and when we leave it will all go back to the hell hole it was.
No More British Lives need to be wasted on these Pointless wars as far as Britian is concerned.
The British Army and the British people should focus on keeping our streets safe and keeping our Countries safe. Not pointlesly wasting their Lives.
We Want Our British Troops back in their Homes in Britian!
